name: DevTools Screenshot Safe
description: Automatically takes screenshots with best practices to avoid 413 errors. Always saves to file and uses compression.
instructions: When taking screenshots with MCP DevTools, ALWAYS use these best practices:
1. ALWAYS specify filePath parameter to save directly to disk instead of returning in response
2. Use format 'jpeg' or 'webp' with quality 70-80 for better compression
3. For full page screenshots, use smaller viewport size first with resize_page
4. Consider using take_snapshot (text) instead of take_screenshot when possible
5. If screenshot of specific element, use uid parameter to capture only that element
- take_snapshot({ filePath: './snapshots/page.txt' }) // Preferred for UI inspection
Always create directory first if needed: mkdir -p screenshots

examples.output: mkdir -p screenshots && take_screenshot({ filePath: './screenshots/page-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).jpg', format: 'jpeg', quality: 75 })
take_snapshot() dulu untuk dapat uid navbar, lalu take_screenshot({ filePath: './screenshots/navbar.png', uid: 'navbar-uid' })
